text: Hari Kumar Rimal (born 13 June 1987) is a Nepalese long-distance runner. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's 5000 metres. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Nepal Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Nepal Category:Nepalese male cross country runners
title: Hari Kumar Rimal
